name: @sfc-gh-dflippo/skills-mcp-server
description: MCP server built with FastMCP that serves skills sync scripts as downloadable resources

scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p dist/resources && cp src/resources/*.py src/resources/*.ts src/resources/*.md dist/resources/
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:ts-script && npm run test:py-script
scripts.test:py-script: npm run build && cd .. && . skills-mcp-server/.venv-test/bin/activate && pytest skills-mcp-server/tests/test_sync_script.py -v
scripts.inspect: npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node dist/index.js
